raw: By Ekaterina Kravtsova LONDON , April 24 ( Reuters ) - Asian spot prices for liquefied natural gas ( LNG ) tumbled this as week as sellers around the world flooded the market with cargo offers , while demand remained subdued amid coronavirus - related lockdowns .
replaced: By Ekaterina Kravtsova LONDON , April 24 ( Reuters ) - Asian spot prices for liquefied natural gas ( LNG ) tumbled this as week as sellers around the world flooded the market with cargo offers , while demand remained subdued amid coronavirus - related lockdowns .

raw: The average LNG price for June delivery into northeast Asia LNG - AS was estimated at around $ 1.95 per million British thermal units ( mmBtu ) on Friday , $ 0.35 per mmBtu lower than the estimate last week .
replaced: The average LNG price for June delivery into northeast Asia LNG - AS was estimated at around $ 1.95 per million British thermal units ( mmBtu ) on Friday , $ 0.35 per mmBtu lower than the estimate last week .

raw: A wave of supply tenders has hit the market as a number of buyers are rescheduling long - term deliveries , leaving suppliers with excess cargoes , an LNG trader said .
replaced: A wave of supply tenders has hit the market as a number of buyers are rescheduling long - term deliveries , leaving suppliers with excess cargoes , an LNG trader said .

raw: “ There ’s some flexibility in long - term contracts .
replaced: “ There ’s some flexibility in long - term contracts .

raw: If the long - term buyer nominates ( volumes ) down , then the surplus cargoes are offered on the spot market , ” another industry source said .
replaced: If the long - term buyer nominates ( volumes ) down , then the surplus cargoes are offered on the market , ” another industry source said .

raw: There were also tenders from usual sellers of spot cargoes , traders said .
replaced: There were also tenders from usual sellers of spot cargoes , traders said .

raw: In Africa , Nigeria Liquefied Natural Gas ( NLNG ) offered two cargoes for loading in May and Angola ’s LNG project offered a cargo for loading in June .
replaced: In Africa , Nigeria Liquefied Natural Gas ( NLNG ) offered two cargoes for loading in May and Angola ’s LNG project offered a cargo for loading in June .

raw: In Asia , Malaysia ’s Petroliam Nasional Bhd , or Petronas , also offered an LNG cargo for delivery in June .
replaced: In Asia , Malaysia ’s Petroliam Nasional Bhd , or Petronas , also offered an LNG cargo for delivery in June .

raw: Exxon Mobil Corp ’s Papua New Guinea LNG export plant sold a cargo for May 25 loading at around $ 1.80 per mmBtu , two sources said .
replaced: Exxon Mobil Corp ’s Australia ’s Ichthys LNG plant sold a cargo for May 25 loading at around $ 1.80 per mmBtu , two sources said .

raw: Brunei ’s LNG export plant has sold a June 9 - 10 loading cargo in a tender that closed on April 20 at close to $ 2.00 per mmBtu , one trader said .

raw: Russia ’s Sakhalin 2 plant offered six cargoes for loading between June 2020 and February 2021 .

raw: Australia ’s Ichthys LNG plant was selling two cargoes for May - June loading , an industry source said .

raw: There was also a tender from Russia ’s Novatek that offered a July delivery cargo to Europe , which was awarded this week , two sources said .

raw: In the United States , loading of around 20 cargoes in June was cancelled this week by buyers from Asia and Europe as prices in these regions were too low to ship a cargo from the United States .
